sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
Daily digest of official releases touching Scottish and wider UK aviation activity:
- **Transparency data: Military Court Service sentencing remarks 2025** — Transcripts of sentencing remarks from Service Court hearings in the Court Martial from 2025.
- **Official Statistics: MOD Diversity Dashboard: October 2025** — Statistics on the diversity declaration and representation of minority groups of civil servants employed by the MOD.
- **Guidance: Military low flying: RAF operational low flying training timetable** — Royal Air Force (RAF) operational low flying training timetables in 3 areas of the UK.
